item.title: MIUI V13.0.5.0.SKAEUXM Recovery update for Mi 11 Ultra EEA
item.description:
New Stable Beta Recovery update available!

Device: Mi 11 Ultra EEA

Codename: star

Version: V13.0.5.0.SKAEUXM | 12.0

Size: 3.9 GB

MD5: 22c3064331408986bc58cc35ac611ac9

Changelog:
[System]
Stable MIUI based on Android 12
[More features and improvements]
New: Apps can be opened as floating windows directly from the sidebar
Optimization: Enhanced accessibility support for Phone, Clock, and Weather
Optimization: Mind map nodes are more convenient and intuitive now

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI V13.0.2.0.SKAMIXM Recovery update for Mi 11 Ultra Global
item.description:
New Stable Beta Recovery update available!

Device: Mi 11 Ultra Global

Codename: star

Version: V13.0.2.0.SKAMIXM | 12.0

Size: 3.8 GB

MD5: eecc15ab6353ebad60a6954c1382f151

Changelog:
[MIUI 13]
New: "Crystallization" super wallpapers
New: A new widget ecosystem with app support
Optimization: Improved overall stability
[System]
Updated Android Security Patch to February 2022. Increased system security.
Stable MIUI based on Android 12
[Wallpaper]
New: "Crystallization" super wallpapers
[More features and improvements]
New: Apps can be opened as floating windows directly from the sidebar
Optimization: Enhanced accessibility support for Phone, Clock, and Weather
Optimization: Mind map nodes are more convenient and intuitive now
